metadata.description: Major wars and conflicts throughout history

wars.name: Greco-Persian Wars
wars.outcome: Greek independence preserved. Persian expansion into Europe halted.
wars.significance: Preserved Greek democracy and culture. Foundation of Western civilization.

wars.name: Peloponnesian War
wars.outcome: Athenian Empire destroyed. Spartan hegemony established briefly.
wars.significance: End of Athenian Golden Age. Weakened all Greek states.

wars.name: Conquests of Alexander the Great
wars.outcome: Persian Empire destroyed. Hellenistic world created.
wars.significance: Spread Greek culture from Egypt to India. Changed world forever.

wars.name: Punic Wars
wars.outcome: Carthage destroyed. Rome became dominant Mediterranean power.
wars.significance: Rome gained control of Western Mediterranean. Hannibal's tactics studied for millennia.

wars.name: Gallic Wars
wars.outcome: Gaul conquered. Caesar gained wealth and army for civil war.
wars.significance: Romanization of Western Europe. Caesar's path to dictatorship.

wars.name: Three Kingdoms War
wars.significance: One of deadliest wars in history. Immortalized in Romance of Three Kingdoms.

wars.name: Arab Conquests
wars.theater: Middle East, North Africa, Persia, Spain
wars.outcome: Islamic empire from Spain to India. Sassanid Persia destroyed.
wars.significance: Created Islamic civilization. Permanent religious/cultural transformation.

wars.name: Mongol Conquests
wars.outcome: Largest contiguous land empire ever. Eurasia connected.
wars.significance: Pax Mongolica enabled trade/ideas. Spread of plague. Destroyed many civilizations.

wars.name: Hundred Years' War
wars.outcome: English expelled from France (except Calais). French monarchy strengthened.
wars.significance: Rise of nationalism. Joan of Arc. End of chivalric warfare.

wars.name: Fall of Constantinople
wars.outcome: Byzantine Empire destroyed. Ottoman control of Bosphorus.
wars.significance: End of Roman Empire (1,500 years). Greek scholars fled west, sparked Renaissance.

wars.name: Thirty Years' War
wars.outcome: Peace of Westphalia. Modern state system established.
wars.significance: Birth of international law. Germany devastated. Religious wars ended.

wars.name: Seven Years' War
wars.outcome: Britain dominant colonial power. France lost North America and India.
wars.significance: First 'world war'. Britain became global hegemon. Set stage for American Revolution.

wars.name: American Revolutionary War
wars.significance: Inspired French Revolution. Beginning of decolonization. Constitutional government model.

wars.name: French Revolutionary & Napoleonic Wars
wars.outcome: Napoleon defeated. Concert of Europe established.
wars.significance: Spread of nationalism, legal codes, metric system. Redrew map of Europe.

wars.name: American Civil War
wars.significance: End of slavery in US. First 'modern' war (railroads, telegraph, total war).

wars.name: World War I
wars.theater: Europe, Middle East, Africa, Atlantic, Pacific
wars.outcome: German, Austro-Hungarian, Ottoman, Russian empires destroyed.
wars.significance: Redrew world map. League of Nations. Set stage for WWII and Cold War.

wars.name: World War II
wars.outcome: Axis powers destroyed. United Nations created. Nuclear age began.
wars.significance: Deadliest war in history. Holocaust. Decolonization. Cold War began. US/USSR superpowers.

wars.name: Cold War
wars.significance: Nuclear deterrence. Space race. Proxy wars killed millions. Shaped modern world order.
